title: Vocabulary & Word Usage - MODERATE Level
description: üìö Elevate your speech! This quiz focuses on intermediate $\text{academic \, vocabulary}$ üéì, tricky $\text{confusables}$ üßê (like $\text{lie/lay}$ and $\text{imply/infer}$), and using words correctly in $\text{context}$. (20 Questions - 40 Minutes)

questions.text: Choose the correct word: 'The company decided to $\mathbf{...}$ a new policy.'
What is a $\mathbf{synonym}$ for $\mathbf{AMBIGUOUS}$?
Which word means 'to suggest or hint without explicitly stating'?
Choose the correct word: 'Please $\mathbf{...}$ the book on the table.' (Transitive verb)
An $\mathbf{Antonym}$ for $\mathbf{BENEVOLENT}$ is:
The $\mathbf{denotation}$ of a word refers to its...
Which word is a $\mathbf{homograph}$ (same spelling, different meaning/pronunciation)?
Which word means 'to make something less severe, serious, or painful'?
The $\mathbf{connotation}$ of the word 'childish' is generally considered...
Choose the correct word: 'The principal provided $\mathbf{...}$ to the staff.'
Which word means 'to avoid making a direct statement'?
The $\mathbf{suffix}$ $\mathbf{-ology}$ means the $\mathbf{study \, of}$. What does $\mathbf{Dermatology}$ study?
Which word correctly completes the comparison: 'He has $\mathbf{...}$ books than I do.'
The word $\mathbf{CENSURE}$ means...
Which word means 'to accept, endorse, or permit something'?
Choose the correct word for the verb: 'The bird was $\mathbf{...}$ in the air.'
The $\mathbf{antonym}$ for $\mathbf{PROMPT}$ (meaning quick/on time) is:
Which phrase is correct usage?
The prefix $\mathbf{mal-}$ (e.g., $\text{malfunction}$) typically means...
Which verb means 'to gather or accumulate (especially a debt or responsibility)'?
